name: Jakarta Pusat
description: The heart of Indonesia's capital, offering premium office spaces surrounded by major business districts and government institutions.

name: Jakarta Selatan
description: A trendy business hub with a perfect blend of modern skyscrapers, lush residential areas, and vibrant lifestyle centers.

name: Bandung Utara
description: Enjoy a refreshing work environment in the cooler northern part of Bandung, known for its creative atmosphere and scenic views.

name: Jakarta Barat
description: A bustling commercial center with rapid development, providing accessible office locations and diverse business opportunities.

name: Bandung Selatan
description: A growing economic zone offering affordable and flexible workspace options in the southern region of Bandung.

name: Jakarta Timur
description: An emerging industrial and business area with great connectivity and plenty of potential for growing enterprises.

name: Bandung Wetan
description: Located in the city center, offering easy access to heritage sites, government offices, and vibrant culinary scenes.
